title: Restart windows to log in?
body:
Hello
I just transferred my account from EUW to Russia since it is 1RP. Now I can only log in after restarting computer and windows. Every time I disconnect from lol client or crash, I have to restart windows, otherwise I can't connect... It say "connecting" and nothing never happens after. It is really annoying... I tried to reinstall LoL, it doesnt change anything.

Any idea?

replies.body:
It sounds like you could have an unstable connection to the Russian server. This may be caused by poor network routing, but I recommend ensuring your local network settings are optimized for League using our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
im having same problem except im na and didnt move to russia
